CIPHER.0.cipherString: We just can't shake monogamy. It definitely demands a kind of rigor and discipline and selflessness. But it's also fun.
CIPHER.0.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: Appreciation can make a day, even change a life. Your willingness to put it into words is all that is necessary.

CIPHER.2.cipherString: It is your passion that empowers you to be able to do that thing you were created to do.

CIPHER.3.cipherString: For the person for whom small things do not exist, the great is not great.

CIPHER.4.cipherString: I don't aspire to be like other drivers - I aspire to be unique in my own way.

CIPHER.5.cipherString: People are so opinionated about things, and they don't even know what they're talking about, or can't even do it themselves.

CIPHER.6.cipherString: There are a lot of things that frustrate me. I get frustrated when I have to wait at a red light.

CIPHER.7.cipherString: You had to make an appointment to see her. But it was just a crazy spectacle, people filing past.
CIPHER.7.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(5,17).

CIPHER.8.cipherString: The really unhappy person is the one who leaves undone what they can do, and starts doing what they don't understand; no wonder they come to grief.

CIPHER.9.cipherString: It is impossible to feel grateful and depressed in the same moment.

CIPHER.10.cipherString: We're at war against the ultimate evil in the world, and We're going to win.

CIPHER.11.cipherString: I've seen shows on Showtime, and they're very provocative, if you will, but nothing to the point that's over-the-top or gratuitous.
CIPHER.11.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(3,8).

CIPHER.12.cipherString: Welcome anything that comes to you, but do not long for anything else.

CIPHER.13.cipherString: Any time people come together in a meeting, we're not necessarily getting the best ideas; we're just getting the ideas of the best talkers.

CIPHER.14.cipherString: The majority of men meet with failure because of their lack of persistence in creating new plans to take the place of those which fail.
CIPHER.14.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(15,21).

CIPHER.15.cipherString: Don't pity me now, don't pity me never; I'm going to do nothing for ever and ever.

CIPHER.16.cipherString: Happiness is neither virtue nor pleasure nor this thing nor that but simply growth, We are happy when we are growing.

CIPHER.18.cipherString: I have realized that the past and future are real illusions, that they exist in the present, which is what there is and all there is.

CIPHER.19.cipherString: I put my heart and my soul into my work, and have lost my mind in the process.

CIPHER.20.cipherString: Molecular biology has routinely taken problematic things under its wing without altering core ideas.

CIPHER.22.cipherString: The word love has by no means the same sense for both sexes, and this is one cause of the serious misunderstandings that divide them.

CIPHER.23.cipherString: I always prefer to believe the best of everybody, it saves so much trouble.

CIPHER.24.cipherString: When you catch a glimpse of your potential, that's when passion is born.

CIPHER.25.cipherString: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.

CIPHER.26.cipherString: Sometimes the creating that we do is creating a platform that allows other creative people to pitch in.

CIPHER.27.cipherString: Every moment and every event of every man's life on earth plants something in his soul.

CIPHER.28.cipherString: I've never really considered myself just a street artist. I consider myself a populist.

CIPHER.30.cipherString: It is literally true that you can succeed best and quickest by helping others to succeed.

CIPHER.31.cipherString: I've always wanted to be an actor, but I didn't know how to become one.
